description: Rows of Pascal's triangle written as a single number.
comments: If n<=500, a(n) is prime only for a(1)=11, a(8)=18285670562881, and a(29) [From _Enrique Pérez Herrero_, Jun 05 2010]
mathematica: A003590[i_Integer] := ToExpression[StringJoin[Table[ToString[Binomial[i, j]], {j, 0, i}]]] [From _Enrique Pérez Herrero_, May 27 2010]
prog: (PARI) A003590(i)={ my(j,a); a=""; for(j=0,i,a=Str(a,binomial(i,j)) ); return(eval(a)); } /* _Enrique Pérez Herrero_, Jun 03 2010 */
author: Matthew Wells (mwells(AT)nmt.edu)
